          <title>
            <string language="en">Strong acid-strong base titration with phenolphthalein as the indicator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Starke Säure-starke niedrige Titrierung mit 
Phenolphthalein als der Anzeige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Titration de base acide-forte forte avec de la 
phénol-phtaléine comme indicateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Titration baixo ácido-forte forte com 
phenolphthalein como o indicador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Titolazione bassa acido-forte forte con 
fenolftaleina come l'indicatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισχυρή όξινος-ισχυρή τιτλοδότηση βάσεων με 
phenolphthalein ως δείκτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Titulación baja a'cido-fuerte fuerte con 
phenolphthalein como el indicador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the change in colour of phenolphthalein as the pH of flask containing hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide decrease.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">indicator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenolphthalein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">titration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Änderung in der Farbe 
des Phenolphthaleins als der pH der Flasche Salzsäure- und 
Natriumhydroxidabnahme enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre le changement de la couleur 
de la phénol-phtaléine comme pH de flacon contenant la diminution 
d'hydroxyde d'acide chlorhydrique et de sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra a mudança na cor do 
phenolphthalein como o pH do flask que contem a diminuição do 
hydroxide do ácido hydrochloric e do sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra il cambiamento a colori di 
fenolftaleina come il pH della boccetta che contiene la diminuzione 
dell'idrossido del sodio e dell'acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει την αλλαγή στο 
χρώμα phenolphthalein ως pH της φιάλης που περιέχει τη 
μείωση υδροξειδίου υδροχλωρικού οξέος και νατρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra el cambio en el color del 
phenolphthalein como el pH del frasco que contiene la disminución del
hidróxido del ácido hidroclórico y del sodio.</string>
          </description>
